name: Minecraft Adventure 2D
description:
One of my first games, make your way trough 8 levels, you need to complete a certain objective in each to go to the next levels try passing them to face the final boss at the end !

QWERTY

A Move left D Move right Space Jump Left mouse click Melee attack Right mouse click Place block

AZERTY

QMove left D Move right Space Jump Left mouse click Melee attack Right mouse click Place block
